column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////You have to try the Lou Malnati's house special salad!!!! Their dressing is so amazing! It's like apples and bacon
column2: perfect! The pizza is delicious! Chicago is known for deep dish
column3: but their thin crust is good! If you are in Chicago
column4: Lou Malnati's is the pizza place to be! :-)
